Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize average story points delivered per sprint.

Name: minimize_cycle_time
Description: Minimize average time from sprint start to DevelopmentSnapshot creation date.

Name: minimize_open_blockers
Description: Minimize the count of unresolved blockers.

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the share of sprints that achieved their goal.

Name: minimize_total_effort
Description: Minimize total estimated effort across SprintBacklog.

Name: maximize_feature_priority_delivered
Description: Maximize delivered priority weight of Features included in ReleasePlan.

Name: minimize_technical_debt_proxy
Description: Minimize tasks with high rework risk (proxy via Task type/effort).

Name: maximize_stakeholder_satisfaction_proxy
Description: Maximize Sprint Review attendance as a proxy for stakeholder engagement.

Name: minimize_requirement_ambiguity_proxy
Description: Minimize User Stories with vague acceptance criteria (proxy via story points/criteria presence).

Name: minimize_budget_usage
Description: Minimize total project budget consumption for planned scope.

Name: maximize_roadmap_progress
Description: Maximize number of milestones achieved within Roadmap interval.

Name: maximize_feature_throughput
Description: Maximize number of Features per DevelopmentSnapshot version.
